title: Toronto Fintech Summit 2025
description: Join us for the largest fintech gathering in Canada. Connect with industry leaders, innovative startups, and investors shaping the future of financial technology.

title: Blockchain Workshop Series
description: A hands-on workshop series exploring practical applications of blockchain technology in financial services. Perfect for developers and business professionals looking to understand the technical aspects of blockchain implementation.

title: Women in Fintech Networking Mixer
description: An evening dedicated to celebrating and connecting women in the fintech industry. Featuring lightning talks from female founders and executives, followed by structured networking opportunities.

title: AI in Financial Services Symposium
description: Explore the cutting-edge applications of artificial intelligence in financial services. This symposium brings together researchers, practitioners, and thought leaders to discuss the latest advancements and future directions of AI in finance.
